about.header: WE’RE READY FOR OUR NEXT CHALLENGE. ARE YOU?
about.text: We’re two Gemini book publishing professionals with a knack for puzzles and puns who want to customize your next scavenger hunt experience. Whatever you’re looking for, we’re ready to stump you!

first.text: Ramp up the party with a mission tailored to your guest of honor.

second.text: Request a hunt inspired by your favorite things.

fourth.text: Rally your employees with a fun team-building challenge.

home.sample_button: fire in the wind for en

howitworks.step-1: Contact us and let us get to know you.
howitworks.step-2: We’ll set up a hunt that’s perfect for your group.
howitworks.step-3: Look for your email instructions twenty-four hours before the hunt.
howitworks.step-4: Embrace your inner detective and have fun!

quote-1.quote: I absolutely loved how personal it was to me and the thought you put into it. I keep telling people about it!

quote-2.quote: I think it’s great for groups like ours where you don’t all know each other. It’s the perfect icebreaker because it gives people something to talk about.

quote-3.quote: Whether you have a special event coming up or are looking for a different and interesting way to spend a Saturday afternoon, my bachelorette party was unlike anything I had done before and was a fun and special way for me to spend a weekend with all my best friends.

quote-4.quote: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

values.value-1: Ramp up the party with a mission tailored to your guest of honor.
values.value-2: Choose your favorite hunt from our list.
